message: I would love if Day[9] or another progamer did a Starcraft 2 strategy show on TWiT
Frogpants studios (the guys behind The Instance) have a starcraft show
I do think that state of the game and the day[9] daily kind of have the market cornered anyways.

The Creep, the Frogpants Studios Starcraft show, recently announced that they won't be doing weekly episodes because there isn't enough news. I wonder if this would be a problem for a potential TWiT show as well.
Even a general esports show would be interesting
The Creep got canceled because all it did was news.  I was thinking of a show more like the day[9] daily of Sotg, which is more about strategy and esports.
They miss the point, people listen for the hosts not the regurgitated news :)
If you're interested in a fantastic Starcraft 2 (audio) podcast check out StarCast at http://www.thestarcast.com/ . They cover news, strategies, GSL etc. Very entertaining show.
